dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
dcterms:description: MNIST image dataset is composed of grayscale handwritten digits such that each digit is represented by a 28Ã—28 pixel image. The first 400 images of the test set are considered, and the dataset is equally split into a validation set and a test set for the refinement/optimization and evaluation of the networks.
dcterms:title: MNIST image dataset

dcterms:creator: Ali Shoeb
dcterms:description: CHB-MIT dataset comprises 23 individuals diagnosed with epileptic seizures, recorded in the international 10-20 system of EEG electrode positions. The dataset includes recordings at a sampling frequency of 256 Hz, with each sample having a 4-second duration. The dataset is utilized for real-time epileptic seizure detection.
dcterms:title: CHB-MIT dataset

H Eugene Stanley
dcterms:description: MIT-BIH dataset contains 48 records of 2-channel ECG signals, digitized with a sampling rate of 360 Hz. The dataset includes subjects aged 23 to 89 years and is used for real-time cardiac arrhythmia detection.
dcterms:title: MIT-BIH dataset
